Articles.Content: Anyone else see this?

For a second I thought you were making a pun about Minmus! Anyways, this is most likely due to the mod Planetshine, since it reflects light from the planet onto an object. I am probably wrong, it may be a pack that adds new stars. Hope this fixes the problem!

6 hours ago, 21603862 said:

For a second I thought you were making a pun about Minmus! Anyways, this is most likely due to the mod Planetshine, since it reflects light from the planet onto an object. I am probably wrong, it may be a pack that adds new stars. Hope this fixes the problem!

This is stock w/Making History
Ok so i/you may be color blind but i dont see anything blue there...Just a lighter grey color than the rest of the mun

25 minutes ago, KerbolExplorer said:

Ok so i/you may be color blind but i dont see anything blue there...Just a lighter grey color than the rest of the mun

You are color blind. There is light blue on the right side of the Mun in the screenshot.
I haven’t seen the pic as I’m on a school iPad, but In my game which is basically just OPT KER and Hyperedit, the title screen Mun is coral-colored on one side, and the other is blue...
